title: SG4D100M
text: SG4D100M is a state-of-the-art molecular foundation model that revolutionizes drug discovery and chemical development. Built on advanced transformer architecture with SE(3) invariance, it enables accurate molecular property prediction and structural analysis across pharmaceutical, specialty chemical, and agricultural applications.

title: SG4D100M
text: SG4D100M is a state-of-the-art molecular foundation model that revolutionizes drug discovery and chemical development. Built on advanced transformer architecture with SE(3) invariance, it enables accurate molecular property prediction and structural analysis across pharmaceutical, specialty chemical, and agricultural applications.

title: SG4D100M
text:
Use cases

Molecular property prediction - Predicting molecular properties such as solubility, pKa, and logP.
Similarity search - Finding similar molecules by comparing their embeddings

title: SG4D100M
text:
How to use

Sign up for an account on GCP
Subscribe to SG4D100M from Vertex AI Model Garden
Transform your molecular data with SG4D100M (ref: notebook: how-to-use.ipynb)

title: SG4D100M
text:
Sign up URLs

Google Cloud Platform: https://cloud.google.com/
SG4D100M: https://console.cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/publishers/syntheticgestalt/model-garden/sg4d100m
